Sentencas: Chromium oxide undergoes reactive evaporation at high temperatures in the presence of oxygen and/or water vapor.
Titulo: The effect of manganese additions on the reactive evaporation of chromium in Ni-Cr alloys

Sentencas: The deposition of gaseous chromium species onto solid oxide fuel cell electrodes can reduce the efficiency of the fuel cell.
Titulo: The effect of manganese additions on the reactive evaporation of chromium in Ni-Cr alloys

Sentencas: Manganese additions can lead to the formation of manganese-chromium spinels, which can reduce chromium evaporation by as much as a factor of 35 at 800 degrees C and 55 at 700 degrees C. Published by Elsevier Ltd. on behalf of Acta Materialia Inc.
Titulo: The effect of manganese additions on the reactive evaporation of chromium in Ni-Cr alloys
